descriptions.en: A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.
descriptions.es: A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.
descriptions.ca: Una criatura violenta que tomba arbres enormes amb les seves destrals brutes i es protegeix amb pedra dura. Si es troba aquest Pokémon als boscos, l'única opció és fugir.
